channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 40 Best Shows on Apple TV, WIRED’s Picks (January 2026)
item.description: Hijack, Pluribus, and The Morning Show are among the best shows on Apple TV this month.

item.title: Luminar founder Austin Russell agrees to accept subpoena in bankruptcy case
item.description: The agreement comes two weeks after Luminar accused its billionaire founder of dodging information requests, as it evaluates potential legal claims.

item.title: Jimmy Wales Will Never Edit Donald Trump’s Wikipedia Page: He ‘Makes Me Insane’
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Big Interview podcast, Wikipedia founder Jimmy Wales talks about maintaining neutrality in an online ecosystem increasin...

item.title: ‘Veronika’ Is the First Cow Known to Use a Tool
item.description: This is the first recorded instance of a bovine using tools from her environment to relieve an itch—leaving scientists astonished.

item.title: Trump administration admits DOGE may have misused Americans’ Social Security data
item.description: The revelation comes as part of a series of corrections in a legal case over DOGE’s access to Social Security Administration data.

item.title: 7 Best All-Clad Deals From the Factory Seconds Sale (2026)
item.description: All-Clad cookware is fantastic and expensive. This sale makes it more accessible.

item.title: UStrive security lapse exposed personal data of its users, including children
item.description: The online mentoring site UStrive exposed email addresses, phone numbers, and other non-public information to other logged-in users. The nonprofit tol...

item.title: X open sources its algorithm while facing a transparency fine and Grok controversies
item.description: In a post to Github on Tuesday, the social media giant purported to share its secret sauce.

item.title: ICE Details a New Minnesota-Based Detention Network That Spans 5 States
item.description: Internal ICE planning documents propose spending up to $50 million on a privately run network capable of shipping immigrants in custody hundreds of mi...

item.title: Why Serve Robotics is acquiring a hospital assistant robot company
item.description: Serve Robotics is expanding beyond its sidewalk delivery roots by acquiring Diligent Robotics, which makes a hospital assistant bot named Moxi.
